page.title: 11LIFE AT BRAMFORD HALL
page.content: I get up in the morning at about 9:15am and draw the curtains,to see the sun shining through the branches of the trees and the dew on the grass glistening.For breakfast I have cereal (coco pops) and then a slice of warm toast spread thickly with margarine. After breakfast we nearly always go out.Sometimes dancing,sometimes shopping,and sometimes to visit people. When we come home we have dinner. Sometimes it is sausage and chips. Dinner is usually at 1:OOpm.After dinner I go out in the woods.I play on our tyre swing.Not far from the house is a very old tree,it is an evergreen oak.It is a super tree for climbing.I quite often sit up the tree and listen to the birds singing.I have a tree den. It has several sections.One part is very cosy.
